blocks.name: crrn
blocks.content: Extend class notation with the n-dimensional Euclidean space.

blocks.name: df-rrn
blocks.content: Define n-dimensional Euclidean space as a metric space with the standard Euclidean norm given by the quadratic mean. (Contributed by Jeff Madsen, 2-Sep-2009.)
blocks.origin:
axiom df-rrn(setvar s0, setvar s1, setvar s2, setvar s3) {
  |- wceq(crrn, cmpt(s0, cfn, cmpo(s1, s2, co(cr, cmap, cv(s0)), co(cr, cmap, cv(s0)), cfv(csqrt, csu(s3, cv(s0), co(co(cfv(cv(s1), cv(s3)), cmin, cfv(cv(s2), cv(s3))), cexp, nat2))))))
  -| diffss(s0, s3)
  -| diffss(s0, s1)
  -| diffss(s0, s2)
  -| diffss(s1, s3)
  -| diffss(s2, s3)
  -| diffss(s1, s2)
}
blocks.pretty:
axiom df-rrn(setvar s0, setvar s1, setvar s2, setvar s3) {
  ‚ä¢ Rn =(s0 ‚àà Fin ‚Ü¶(s1 ‚àà(‚Ñù[‚Ü¶]s0), s2 ‚àà(‚Ñù[‚Ü¶]s0)‚Ü¶(sqrt ` sum(s3 ‚àà s0,(((s1 ` s3)[-](s2 ` s3))[^]2)))))
  ‚ä£ d(s0, s3)
  ‚ä£ d(s0, s1)
  ‚ä£ d(s0, s2)
  ‚ä£ d(s1, s3)
  ‚ä£ d(s2, s3)
  ‚ä£ d(s1, s2)
}

blocks.name: rrnval
blocks.content: The n-dimensional Euclidean space. (Contributed by Jeff Madsen, 2-Sep-2009.) (Revised by Mario Carneiro, 13-Sep-2015.)

thm rrnval(setvar s0, setvar s1, setvar s2, class c0, class c1) {
  |- wi(wcel(c0, cfn), wceq(cfv(crrn, c0), cmpo(s0, s1, c1, c1, cfv(csqrt, csu(s2, c0, co(co(cfv(cv(s0), cv(s2)), cmin, cfv(cv(s1), cv(s2))), cexp, nat2))))))
  -| wceq(c1, co(cr, cmap, c0))
  -| diffss(s0, s1)
  -| diffss(s0, s2)
  -| diffss(s1, s2)
  -| diffsc(s0, c0)
  -| diffsc(s0, c1)
  -| diffsc(s1, c0)
  -| diffsc(s1, c1)
  -| diffsc(s2, c0)
  -| diffsc(s2, c1)
} = {
  a1ii(wi(wcel(c0, cfn), wceq(cfv(crrn, c0), cmpo(s0, s1, c1, c1, cfv(csqrt, csu(s2, c0, co(co(cfv(cv(s0), cv(s2)), cmin, cfv(cv(s1), cv(s2))), cexp, nat2)))))), diffsc(s2, c0))

  fvmpt(hs0, c0, cfn, crrn, cmpo(s0, s1, c1, c1, cfv(csqrt, csu(s2, c0, co(co(cfv(cv(s0), cv(s2)), cmin, cfv(cv(s1), cv(s2))), cexp, nat2)))), cmpo(s0, s1, co(cr, cmap, cv(hs0)), co(cr, cmap, cv(hs0)), cfv(csqrt, csu(s2, cv(hs0), co(co(cfv(cv(s0), cv(s2)), cmin, cfv(cv(s1), cv(s2))), cexp, nat2)))))
  mpoeq123dv(s0, s1, co(cr, cmap, cv(hs0)), co(cr, cmap, cv(hs0)), cfv(csqrt, csu(s2, cv(hs0), co(co(cfv(cv(s0), cv(s2)), cmin, cfv(cv(s1), cv(s2))), cexp, nat2))), c1, c1, cfv(csqrt, csu(s2, c0, co(co(cfv(cv(s0), cv(s2)), cmin, cfv(cv(s1), cv(s2))), cexp, nat2))), wceq(cv(hs0), c0))
  syl6eqr(co(cr, cmap, cv(hs0)), c1, co(cr, cmap, c0), wceq(cv(hs0), c0))
  oveq2(cv(hs0), c0, cr, cmap)
  fveq2d(csqrt, csu(s2, cv(hs0), co(co(cfv(cv(s0), cv(s2)), cmin, cfv(cv(s1), cv(s2))), cexp, nat2)), csu(s2, c0, co(co(cfv(cv(s0), cv(s2)), cmin, cfv(cv(s1), cv(s2))), cexp, nat2)), wceq(cv(hs0), c0))
  sumeq1(s2, cv(hs0), c0, co(co(cfv(cv(s0), cv(s2)), cmin, cfv(cv(s1), cv(s2))), cexp, nat2))
  df-rrn(hs0, s0, s1, s2)
  mp3an(wcel(cmpo(s0, s1, c1, c1, cfv(csqrt, csu(s2, c0, co(co(cfv(cv(s0), cv(s2)), cmin, cfv(cv(s1), cv(s2))), cexp, nat2)))), universe), wf(cmpo(s0, s1, c1, c1, cfv(csqrt, csu(s2, c0, co(co(cfv(cv(s0), cv(s2)), cmin, cfv(cv(s1), cv(s2))), cexp, nat2)))), cxp(c1, c1), cun(crn(csqrt), csn(emptycls))), wcel(cxp(c1, c1), universe), wcel(cun(crn(csqrt), csn(emptycls)), universe))
  mpbi(wf(cmpo(s0, s1, c1, c1, cfv(csqrt, csu(s2, c0, co(co(cfv(cv(s0), cv(s2)), cmin, cfv(cv(s1), cv(s2))), cexp, nat2)))), cxp(c1, c1), cun(crn(csqrt), csn(emptycls))), wral(s0, c1, wral(s1, c1, wcel(cfv(csqrt, csu(s2, c0, co(co(cfv(cv(s0), cv(s2)), cmin, cfv(cv(s1), cv(s2))), cexp, nat2))), cun(crn(csqrt), csn(emptycls))))))
  rgen2w(s0, s1, c1, c1, wcel(cfv(csqrt, csu(s2, c0, co(co(cfv(cv(s0), cv(s2)), cmin, cfv(cv(s1), cv(s2))), cexp, nat2))), cun(crn(csqrt), csn(emptycls))))
  fvrn0(csqrt, csu(s2, c0, co(co(cfv(cv(s0), cv(s2)), cmin, cfv(cv(s1), cv(s2))), cexp, nat2)))
  fmpt2(s0, s1, c1, c1, cfv(csqrt, csu(s2, c0, co(co(cfv(cv(s0), cv(s2)), cmin, cfv(cv(s1), cv(s2))), cexp, nat2))), cun(crn(csqrt), csn(emptycls)), cmpo(s0, s1, c1, c1, cfv(csqrt, csu(s2, c0, co(co(cfv(cv(s0), cv(s2)), cmin, cfv(cv(s1), cv(s2))), cexp, nat2)))))
  eqid(cmpo(s0, s1, c1, c1, cfv(csqrt, csu(s2, c0, co(co(cfv(cv(s0), cv(s2)), cmin, cfv(cv(s1), cv(s2))), cexp, nat2)))))
  xpex(c1, c1)
  eqeltri(c1, universe, co(cr, cmap, c0))
  ovex(cr, cmap, c0)
  unex(crn(csqrt), csn(emptycls))
  ssexi(crn(csqrt), cc)
  cnex()
  ax-mp(wss(crn(csqrt), cc), wf(csqrt, cc, cc))
  sqrtf()
  frn(csqrt, cc, cc)
  p0ex()
  fex2(cmpo(s0, s1, c1, c1, cfv(csqrt, csu(s2, c0, co(co(cfv(cv(s0), cv(s2)), cmin, cfv(cv(s1), cv(s2))), cexp, nat2)))), cxp(c1, c1), cun(crn(csqrt), csn(emptycls)), universe, universe)
  diff.hs0.c(c0)
  diff.hs0.c(cfn)
  diff.hs0.c(cmpo(s0, s1, c1, c1, cfv(csqrt, csu(s2, c0, co(co(cfv(cv(s0), cv(s2)), cmin, cfv(cv(s1), cv(s2))), cexp, nat2)))))
  diff.wceq.s(s0, cv(hs0), c0)
  diff.cv.s(s0, hs0)
  diffss.ex(s0, hs0)
  diff.wceq.s(s1, cv(hs0), c0)
  diff.cv.s(s1, hs0)
  diffss.ex(s1, hs0)
  diff.hs0.s(s2)
  diff.hs0.s(s0)
  diff.hs0.s(s1)
  diff.cun.s(s0, crn(csqrt), csn(emptycls))
  diff.crn.s(s0, csqrt)
  diff.csqrt.s(s0)
  diff.csn.s(s0, emptycls)
  diff.emptycls.s(s0)
  diff.cun.s(s1, crn(csqrt), csn(emptycls))
  diff.crn.s(s1, csqrt)
  diff.csqrt.s(s1)
  diff.csn.s(s1, emptycls)
  diff.emptycls.s(s1)
}

thm rrnval(setvar s0, setvar s1, setvar s2, class c0, class c1) {
  ‚ä¢ (c0 ‚àà Fin ‚Üí(Rn ` c0)=(s0 ‚àà c1, s1 ‚àà c1 ‚Ü¶(sqrt ` sum(s2 ‚àà c0,(((s0 ` s2)[-](s1 ` s2))[^]2)))))
  ‚ä£ c1 =(‚Ñù[‚Ü¶]c0)
  ‚ä£ d(s0, s1)
  ‚ä£ d(s0, s2)
  ‚ä£ d(s1, s2)
  ‚ä£ d(s0, c0)
  ‚ä£ d(s0, c1)
  ‚ä£ d(s1, c0)
  ‚ä£ d(s1, c1)
  ‚ä£ d(s2, c0)
  ‚ä£ d(s2, c1)
} = {
  a1ii((c0 ‚àà Fin ‚Üí(Rn ` c0)=(s0 ‚àà c1, s1 ‚àà c1 ‚Ü¶(sqrt ` sum(s2 ‚àà c0,(((s0 ` s2)[-](s1 ` s2))[^]2))))), d(s2, c0))

  fvmpt(hs0, c0, cfn, crrn, (s0 ‚àà c1, s1 ‚àà c1 ‚Ü¶(sqrt ` sum(s2 ‚àà c0,(((s0 ` s2)[-](s1 ` s2))[^]2)))), (s0 ‚àà(‚Ñù[‚Ü¶]hs0), s1 ‚àà(‚Ñù[‚Ü¶]hs0)‚Ü¶(sqrt ` sum(s2 ‚àà hs0,(((s0 ` s2)[-](s1 ` s2))[^]2)))))
  mpoeq123dv(s0, s1, (‚Ñù[‚Ü¶]hs0), (‚Ñù[‚Ü¶]hs0), (sqrt ` sum(s2 ‚àà hs0,(((s0 ` s2)[-](s1 ` s2))[^]2))), c1, c1, (sqrt ` sum(s2 ‚àà c0,(((s0 ` s2)[-](s1 ` s2))[^]2))), hs0 = c0)
  syl6eqr((‚Ñù[‚Ü¶]hs0), c1, (‚Ñù[‚Ü¶]c0), hs0 = c0)
  oveq2(hs0, c0, cr, cmap)
  fveq2d(csqrt, sum(s2 ‚àà hs0,(((s0 ` s2)[-](s1 ` s2))[^]2)), sum(s2 ‚àà c0,(((s0 ` s2)[-](s1 ` s2))[^]2)), hs0 = c0)
  sumeq1(s2, hs0, c0, (((s0 ` s2)[-](s1 ` s2))[^]2))
  df-rrn(hs0, s0, s1, s2)
  mp3an((s0 ‚àà c1, s1 ‚àà c1 ‚Ü¶(sqrt ` sum(s2 ‚àà c0,(((s0 ` s2)[-](s1 ` s2))[^]2))))‚àà ùïå, ((s0 ‚àà c1, s1 ‚àà c1 ‚Ü¶(sqrt ` sum(s2 ‚àà c0,(((s0 ` s2)[-](s1 ` s2))[^]2)))):(c1 √ó c1)‚Üí(ran(sqrt)‚ãÉ { ‚àÖ })), (c1 √ó c1)‚àà ùïå, (ran(sqrt)‚ãÉ { ‚àÖ })‚àà ùïå)
  mpbi(((s0 ‚àà c1, s1 ‚àà c1 ‚Ü¶(sqrt ` sum(s2 ‚àà c0,(((s0 ` s2)[-](s1 ` s2))[^]2)))):(c1 √ó c1)‚Üí(ran(sqrt)‚ãÉ { ‚àÖ })), ‚àÄ(s0 ‚àà c1, ‚àÄ(s1 ‚àà c1,(sqrt ` sum(s2 ‚àà c0,(((s0 ` s2)[-](s1 ` s2))[^]2)))‚àà(ran(sqrt)‚ãÉ { ‚àÖ }))))
  rgen2w(s0, s1, c1, c1, (sqrt ` sum(s2 ‚àà c0,(((s0 ` s2)[-](s1 ` s2))[^]2)))‚àà(ran(sqrt)‚ãÉ { ‚àÖ }))
  fvrn0(csqrt, sum(s2 ‚àà c0,(((s0 ` s2)[-](s1 ` s2))[^]2)))
  fmpt2(s0, s1, c1, c1, (sqrt ` sum(s2 ‚àà c0,(((s0 ` s2)[-](s1 ` s2))[^]2))), (ran(sqrt)‚ãÉ { ‚àÖ }), (s0 ‚àà c1, s1 ‚àà c1 ‚Ü¶(sqrt ` sum(s2 ‚àà c0,(((s0 ` s2)[-](s1 ` s2))[^]2)))))

blocks.name: rrnmval
blocks.content: The value of the Euclidean metric. (Contributed by Jeff Madsen, 2-Sep-2009.) (Revised by Mario Carneiro, 13-Sep-2015.)
blocks.origin:
thm rrnmval(setvar s0, class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3) {
  |- wi(w3a(wcel(c0, cfn), wcel(c1, c2), wcel(c3, c2)), wceq(co(c1, cfv(crrn, c0), c3), cfv(csqrt, csu(s0, c0, co(co(cfv(c1, cv(s0)), cmin, cfv(c3, cv(s0))), cexp, nat2)))))
  -| wceq(c2, co(cr, cmap, c0))
  -| diffsc(s0, c0)
  -| diffsc(s0, c1)
  -| diffsc(s0, c2)
  -| diffsc(s0, c3)
} = {
  ovmpt2d(hs0, hs1, c1, cfv(crrn, c0), c3, cfv(csqrt, csu(s0, c0, co(co(cfv(c1, cv(s0)), cmin, cfv(c3, cv(s0))), cexp, nat2))), c2, c2, cfv(csqrt, csu(s0, c0, co(co(cfv(cv(hs0), cv(s0)), cmin, cfv(cv(hs1), cv(s0))), cexp, nat2))), universe, w3a(wcel(c0, cfn), wcel(c1, c2), wcel(c3, c2)))
  3ad2ant1(wcel(c0, cfn), wcel(c1, c2), wcel(c3, c2), wceq(cfv(crrn, c0), cmpo(hs0, hs1, c2, c2, cfv(csqrt, csu(s0, c0, co(co(cfv(cv(hs0), cv(s0)), cmin, cfv(cv(hs1), cv(s0))), cexp, nat2))))))
  rrnval(hs0, hs1, s0, c0, c2)
  adantl(w3a(wcel(c0, cfn), wcel(c1, c2), wcel(c3, c2)), wa(wceq(cv(hs0), c1), wceq(cv(hs1), c3)), wceq(cfv(csqrt, csu(s0, c0, co(co(cfv(cv(hs0), cv(s0)), cmin, cfv(cv(hs1), cv(s0))), cexp, nat2))), cfv(csqrt, csu(s0, c0, co(co(cfv(c1, cv(s0)), cmin, cfv(c3, cv(s0))), cexp, nat2)))))
  fveq2d(csqrt, csu(s0, c0, co(co(cfv(cv(hs0), cv(s0)), cmin, cfv(cv(hs1), cv(s0))), cexp, nat2)), csu(s0, c0, co(co(cfv(c1, cv(s0)), cmin, cfv(c3, cv(s0))), cexp, nat2)), wa(wceq(cv(hs0), c1), wceq(cv(hs1), c3)))
  sumeq2sdv(s0, c0, co(co(cfv(cv(hs0), cv(s0)), cmin, cfv(cv(hs1), cv(s0))), cexp, nat2), co(co(cfv(c1, cv(s0)), cmin, cfv(c3, cv(s0))), cexp, nat2), wa(wceq(cv(hs0), c1), wceq(cv(hs1), c3)))
  oveq1d(co(cfv(cv(hs0), cv(s0)), cmin, cfv(cv(hs1), cv(s0))), cexp, nat2, co(cfv(c1, cv(s0)), cmin, cfv(c3, cv(s0))), wa(wceq(cv(hs0), c1), wceq(cv(hs1), c3)))
  oveqan12d(cfv(cv(hs0), cv(s0)), cmin, cfv(cv(hs1), cv(s0)), cfv(c1, cv(s0)), cfv(c3, cv(s0)), wceq(cv(hs0), c1), wceq(cv(hs1), c3))
  fveq1(cv(hs0), c1, cv(s0))
  fveq1(cv(hs1), c3, cv(s0))
  simp2(wcel(c0, cfn), wcel(c1, c2), wcel(c3, c2))
  simp3(wcel(c0, cfn), wcel(c1, c2), wcel(c3, c2))
  fvexd(csqrt, csu(s0, c0, co(co(cfv(c1, cv(s0)), cmin, cfv(c3, cv(s0))), cexp, nat2)), w3a(wcel(c0, cfn), wcel(c1, c2), wcel(c3, c2)))
  diff.hs0.s(hs1)
  diff.hs0.c(c1)
  diff.hs0.c(c3)
  diff.hs0.c(cfv(csqrt, csu(s0, c0, co(co(cfv(c1, cv(s0)), cmin, cfv(c3, cv(s0))), cexp, nat2))))
  diff.hs1.c(c1)
  diff.hs1.c(c3)
  diff.hs1.c(cfv(csqrt, csu(s0, c0, co(co(cfv(c1, cv(s0)), cmin, cfv(c3, cv(s0))), cexp, nat2))))
  diff.hs0.w(w3a(wcel(c0, cfn), wcel(c1, c2), wcel(c3, c2)))
  diff.hs1.w(w3a(wcel(c0, cfn), wcel(c1, c2), wcel(c3, c2)))
  diff.hs0.c(c0)
  diff.hs0.c(c2)
  diff.hs1.c(c0)
  diff.hs1.c(c2)
  diff.wa.s(s0, wceq(cv(hs0), c1), wceq(cv(hs1), c3))
  diff.wceq.s(s0, cv(hs0), c1)
  diff.cv.s(s0, hs0)
  diffss.ex(s0, hs0)
  diff.hs0.s(s0)
  diff.wceq.s(s0, cv(hs1), c3)
  diff.cv.s(s0, hs1)
  diffss.ex(s0, hs1)
  diff.hs1.s(s0)
}

thm rrnmval(setvar s0, class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3) {
  ‚ä¢ ((c0 ‚àà Fin ‚àß c1 ‚àà c2 ‚àß c3 ‚àà c2)‚Üí(c1[(Rn ` c0)]c3)=(sqrt ` sum(s0 ‚àà c0,(((c1 ` s0)[-](c3 ` s0))[^]2))))
  ‚ä£ c2 =(‚Ñù[‚Ü¶]c0)
  ‚ä£ d(s0, c0)
  ‚ä£ d(s0, c1)
  ‚ä£ d(s0, c2)
  ‚ä£ d(s0, c3)
} = {
  ovmpt2d(hs0, hs1, c1, (Rn ` c0), c3, (sqrt ` sum(s0 ‚àà c0,(((c1 ` s0)[-](c3 ` s0))[^]2))), c2, c2, (sqrt ` sum(s0 ‚àà c0,(((hs0 ` s0)[-](hs1 ` s0))[^]2))), universe, (c0 ‚àà Fin ‚àß c1 ‚àà c2 ‚àß c3 ‚àà c2))
  3ad2ant1(c0 ‚àà Fin, c1 ‚àà c2, c3 ‚àà c2, (Rn ` c0)=(hs0 ‚àà c2, hs1 ‚àà c2 ‚Ü¶(sqrt ` sum(s0 ‚àà c0,(((hs0 ` s0)[-](hs1 ` s0))[^]2)))))
  rrnval(hs0, hs1, s0, c0, c2)
  adantl((c0 ‚àà Fin ‚àß c1 ‚àà c2 ‚àß c3 ‚àà c2), (hs0 = c1 ‚àß hs1 = c3), (sqrt ` sum(s0 ‚àà c0,(((hs0 ` s0)[-](hs1 ` s0))[^]2)))=(sqrt ` sum(s0 ‚àà c0,(((c1 ` s0)[-](c3 ` s0))[^]2))))
  fveq2d(csqrt, sum(s0 ‚àà c0,(((hs0 ` s0)[-](hs1 ` s0))[^]2)), sum(s0 ‚àà c0,(((c1 ` s0)[-](c3 ` s0))[^]2)), (hs0 = c1 ‚àß hs1 = c3))

blocks.name: rrnmet
blocks.content: Euclidean space is a metric space. (Contributed by Jeff Madsen, 2-Sep-2009.) (Proof shortened by Mario Carneiro, 5-Jun-2014.)

blocks.name: rrndstprj1
blocks.content: The distance between two points in Euclidean space is greater than the distance between the projections onto one coordinate. (Contributed by Jeff Madsen, 2-Sep-2009.) (Revised by Mario Carneiro, 13-Sep-2015.)

blocks.name: rrndstprj2
blocks.content: Bound on the distance between two points in Euclidean space given bounds on the distances in each coordinate. This theorem and ~ rrndstprj1 can be used to show that the supremum norm and Euclidean norm are equivalent. (Contributed by Jeff Madsen, 2-Sep-2009.) (Revised by Mario Carneiro, 13-Sep-2015.)

blocks.name: rrncmslem
blocks.content: Lemma for ~ rrncms . (Contributed by Jeff Madsen, 6-Jun-2014.) (Revised by Mario Carneiro, 13-Sep-2015.)
blocks.origin:
thm rrncmslem(setvar s0, setvar s1, class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, class c4, class c5, wff w0) {
  |- wi(w0, wcel(c0, cdm(cfv(clm, c1))))
  -| wceq(c2, co(cr, cmap, c3))
  -| wceq(c4, cres(ccom(cabs, cmin), cxp(cr, cr)))
  -| wceq(c1, cfv(cmopn, cfv(crrn, c3)))
  -| wi(w0, wcel(c3, cfn))
  -| wi(w0, wcel(c0, cfv(ccau, cfv(crrn, c3))))
  -| wi(w0, wf(c0, cn, c2))
  -| wceq(c5, cmpt(s0, c3, cfv(cli, cmpt(s1, cn, cfv(cfv(c0, cv(s1)), cv(s0))))))
  -| diffss(s0, s1)
  -| diffsc(s0, c0)
  -| diffsc(s0, c3)
  -| diffsc(s1, c0)
} = {
  sylancr(w0, wcel(c0, cdm(cfv(clm, c1))), wrel(cfv(clm, c1)), wbr(c0, cfv(clm, c1), c5))
  lmrel(c1)

blocks.name: rrncms
blocks.content: Euclidean space is complete. (Contributed by Jeff Madsen, 2-Sep-2009.) (Revised by Mario Carneiro, 13-Sep-2015.)
blocks.origin:
thm rrncms(class c0, class c1) {
  |- wi(wcel(c0, cfn), wcel(cfv(crrn, c0), cfv(ccmet, c1)))
  -| wceq(c1, co(cr, cmap, c0))
} = {
  mpbird(wcel(c0, cfn), wcel(cfv(crrn, c0), cfv(ccmet, c1)), wral(hs0, cfv(ccau, cfv(crrn, c0)), wi(wf(cv(hs0), cn, c1), wcel(cv(hs0), cdm(cfv(clm, cfv(cmopn, cfv(crrn, c0))))))))
  ralrimiva(hs0, cfv(ccau, cfv(crrn, c0)), wcel(c0, cfn), wi(wf(cv(hs0), cn, c1), wcel(cv(hs0), cdm(cfv(clm, cfv(cmopn, cfv(crrn, c0)))))))
  ex(wa(wcel(c0, cfn), wcel(cv(hs0), cfv(ccau, cfv(crrn, c0)))), wf(cv(hs0), cn, c1), wcel(cv(hs0), cdm(cfv(clm, cfv(cmopn, cfv(crrn, c0))))))
  rrncmslem(hs2, hs1, cv(hs0), cfv(cmopn, cfv(crrn, c0)), c1, c0, cres(ccom(cabs, cmin), cxp(cr, cr)), cmpt(hs2, c0, cfv(cli, cmpt(hs1, cn, cfv(cfv(cv(hs0), cv(hs1)), cv(hs2))))), wa(wa(wcel(c0, cfn), wcel(cv(hs0), cfv(ccau, cfv(crrn, c0)))), wf(cv(hs0), cn, c1)))

  fveq2d(cds, c3, co(cfv(csca, ccnfld), cprds, cxp(c0, csn(co(ccnfld, cress, cr)))), wcel(c0, cfn))

  eqtrd(co(cr, cmap, c0), cfv(cbs, co(cfv(csca, ccnfld), cprds, cxp(c0, csn(co(ccnfld, cress, cr))))), cfv(cbs, c3), wcel(c0, cfn))
  mpan(wcel(c0, cfn), wceq(co(cr, cmap, c0), cfv(cbs, c3)), wcel(co(ccnfld, cress, cr), universe))
  pwsbas(co(ccnfld, cress, cr), universe, c0, cfn, cr, c3)

blocks.name: rrnheibor
blocks.content: Heine-Borel theorem for Euclidean space. A subset of Euclidean space is compact iff it is closed and bounded. (Contributed by Jeff Madsen, 2-Sep-2009.) (Revised by Mario Carneiro, 22-Sep-2015.)
blocks.origin:
thm rrnheibor(class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, class c4, class c5) {
  |- wi(wa(wcel(c0, cfn), wss(c1, c2)), wb(wcel(c3, ccmp), wa(wcel(c1, cfv(ccld, c4)), wcel(c5, cfv(cbnd, c1)))))
  -| wceq(c2, co(cr, cmap, c0))
  -| wceq(c5, cres(cfv(crrn, c0), cxp(c1, c1)))
  -| wceq(c3, cfv(cmopn, c5))
  -| wceq(c4, cfv(cmopn, cfv(crrn, c0)))
} = {
  bitrd(wa(wcel(c0, cfn), wss(c1, c2)), wcel(c3, ccmp), wa(wcel(c1, cfv(ccld, c4)), wcel(c5, cfv(cbnd, c1))), wa(wcel(c5, cfv(ccmet, c1)), wcel(c5, cfv(ctotbnd, c1))))
  syl6bb(wa(wcel(c0, cfn), wss(c1, c2)), wcel(c3, ccmp), wa(wcel(c5, cfv(ccmet, c1)), wcel(c5, cfv(ctotbnd, c1))), wa(wcel(c5, cfv(cmet, c1)), wcel(c3, ccmp)))
  biantrurd(wa(wcel(c0, cfn), wss(c1, c2)), wcel(c3, ccmp), wcel(c5, cfv(cmet, c1)))
  sylan(wcel(c0, cfn), wss(c1, c2), wcel(c5, cfv(cmet, c1)), wcel(cfv(crrn, c0), cfv(cmet, c2)))
  rrnmet(c0, c2)
  syl5eqel(c5, cfv(cmet, c1), cres(cfv(crrn, c0), cxp(c1, c1)), wa(wcel(cfv(crrn, c0), cfv(cmet, c2)), wss(c1, c2)))
  metres2(cfv(crrn, c0), c2, c1)
  heibor(c5, c1, c3)
  anbi12d(wa(wcel(c0, cfn), wss(c1, c2)), wcel(c5, cfv(ccmet, c1)), wcel(c5, cfv(ctotbnd, c1)), wcel(c1, cfv(ccld, c4)), wcel(c5, cfv(cbnd, c1)))
  syl5bb(wa(wcel(c0, cfn), wss(c1, c2)), wcel(c5, cfv(ccmet, c1)), wcel(c1, cfv(ccld, c4)), wcel(cres(cfv(crrn, c0), cxp(c1, c1)), cfv(ccmet, c1)))
  eleq1i(c5, cfv(ccmet, c1), cres(cfv(crrn, c0), cxp(c1, c1)))
  syl(wa(wcel(c0, cfn), wss(c1, c2)), wb(wcel(cres(cfv(crrn, c0), cxp(c1, c1)), cfv(ccmet, c1)), wcel(c1, cfv(ccld, c4))), wcel(cfv(crrn, c0), cfv(ccmet, c2)))
  adantr(wcel(c0, cfn), wss(c1, c2), wcel(cfv(crrn, c0), cfv(ccmet, c2)))
  rrncms(c0, c2)
  cmetss(cfv(crrn, c0), c2, c1, c4)
  adantr(wcel(c0, cfn), wss(c1, c2), wb(wcel(c5, cfv(ctotbnd, c1)), wcel(c5, cfv(cbnd, c1))))
  rrntotbnd(c0, c5, c1, c2)

  ‚ä¢ ((c0 ‚àà Fin ‚àß c1 ‚äÜ c2)‚Üí(c3 ‚àà Comp ‚Üî(c1 ‚àà(Clsd ` c4)‚àß c5 ‚àà(Bnd ` c1))))
  ‚ä£ c2 =(‚Ñù[‚Ü¶]c0)
  ‚ä£ c5 =((Rn ` c0)|`(c1 √ó c1))
  ‚ä£ c3 =(MetOpen ` c5)
  ‚ä£ c4 =(MetOpen `(Rn ` c0))
} = {
  bitrd((c0 ‚àà Fin ‚àß c1 ‚äÜ c2), c3 ‚àà Comp, (c1 ‚àà(Clsd ` c4)‚àß c5 ‚àà(Bnd ` c1)), (c5 ‚àà(CMet ` c1)‚àß c5 ‚àà(TotBnd ` c1)))

  sylan(c0 ‚àà Fin, c1 ‚äÜ c2, c5 ‚àà(Met ` c1), (Rn ` c0)‚àà(Met ` c2))

  metres2((Rn ` c0), c2, c1)
  heibor(c5, c1, c3)
  anbi12d((c0 ‚àà Fin ‚àß c1 ‚äÜ c2), c5 ‚àà(CMet ` c1), c5 ‚àà(TotBnd ` c1), c1 ‚àà(Clsd ` c4), c5 ‚àà(Bnd ` c1))
  syl5bb((c0 ‚àà Fin ‚àß c1 ‚äÜ c2), c5 ‚àà(CMet ` c1), c1 ‚àà(Clsd ` c4), ((Rn ` c0)|`(c1 √ó c1))‚àà(CMet ` c1))
  eleq1i(c5, (CMet ` c1), ((Rn ` c0)|`(c1 √ó c1)))
  syl((c0 ‚àà Fin ‚àß c1 ‚äÜ c2), (((Rn ` c0)|`(c1 √ó c1))‚àà(CMet ` c1)‚Üî c1 ‚àà(Clsd ` c4)), (Rn ` c0)‚àà(CMet ` c2))
  adantr(c0 ‚àà Fin, c1 ‚äÜ c2, (Rn ` c0)‚àà(CMet ` c2))
